front.setup:
Put Coil: Scheming and Coil: Acting into play, "Evil Mastermind" side up. Put Underground Base into play.
Note that Coil: Scheming activates before Coil: Acting.

front.title: Evil Mastermind
front.text:
When flipped to this side, set this card's HP to Coil: Acting's HP.
At the start of the villain turn, play the top card of the environment deck At the end of the villain turn, all villain targets regain 2 HP
When this card would be destroyed, flip it instead.
front.advanced: At the end of the villain turn, if Coil: Acting has more HP than this card, set this card's HP to Coil: Acting's HP.

back.title: Defeated
back.text: If Coil: Acting is flipped to the "Defeated" side, the heroes win the game.
back.advanced: At the end of the villain turn, flip this card.

front.title: Evil Mastermind
front.text:
When flipped to this side, set this card's HP to Coil: Scheming's HP.
At the start of the villain turn, reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until you reveal a Parahuman. Put it into play, then shuffle the other revealed cards back into the villain deck. At the end of the villain turn, deal H energy damage to the hero target with the highest HP.
When this card would be destroyed, flip it instead.
front.advanced: At the end of the villain turn, if Coil: Scheming has more HP than this card, set this card's HP to Coil: Scheming's HP.

back.title: Defeated
back.text: If Coil: Scheming is flipped to the "Defeated" side, the heroes win the game.
back.advanced: At the end of the villain turn, flip this card.

card.name: Mercenaries
card.text: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals H - 1 energy damage to the two hero targets with the highest HP

card.name: Sundancer
card.text: This card is immune to fire damage. At the end of the villain turn, this card deals 2 fire damage to all hero targets

card.name: Trickster
card.text: The first time Trickster would be dealt damage each round, redirect it to the hero target with the lowest HP. At the end of the villain turn, the hero with most cards in play destroys 1 card
